node.doctext:
Apache Processes

[%
 return `ps aux | grep apache2 | grep -v grep`;
%]
[%
  return "Apache threads running: ".`ps aux | grep apache2 | grep -v grep | wc -l`;
%]

VM Stat

[%
  return `vmstat`;
%]

Uptime

[%
  return `uptime`;
%]

Cloud Health Check

[% return `/var/everything/tools/container-health-check.pl --debug-cloudwatch 2>&1`; %]

Apache config

[%
 return `cat /etc/apache2/everything.conf`;
%]
node.title: Server Telemetry
